name: define values required for adding trade to portfolio
func:
// portfolio_id is set to unixtime
let d = Date.now() // use to dynamically assign id

let id = d
let login = 'pta17'
let ticker = flow.get("tickers")
let algo_name = "Short Top Stocks"
let asset_class = 'stocks' // stocks or crypto
let number = 10 // number of tickers in portfolio
let target = 1 // target profit pct
let account = 'paper'
let psize = 50000 // size of portfolio
let status = 'running'
let algo_type = 'intraday'
let benchmark = 'SPY'

node.warn(ticker)

msg.id = id
msg.login = login
msg.ticker = ticker
msg.algo_name = algo_name
msg.asset_class = asset_class
msg.number = number
msg.target = target
msg.account = account
msg.psize = psize
msg.status = status
msg.algo_type = algo_type
msg.benchmark = benchmark

return msg;

name: Flow 2: Create new entry in algos table (FIRST TIME ONLY)
add values to algos table

props.v: update algos set gain_today = -158.7135149876422767159823658, gain_alltime = -158.71351498764227674, pctgain_today = 0, pctgain_alltime = 0 where algo_name = 'Buy and Sell BTCUSD on Profit Target';
update order_confirms set subtag = 'Buy/Short SPY on News' where symbol = 'SPY'
update order_confirms set subtag = 'Trade BTCUSD'  where symbol = 'BTC/USD'

name: Flow 4: Place limit orders on profit target starting at 4 am
create Alpaca order
get tickers from algos
get tickers where profitpct > target
func:
let symbol = msg.symbol
let algo_name = flow.get("algo_name")


let asset_id = msg.payload["asset_id"]
let ticker = msg.payload["symbol"]
let exchange = msg.payload["exchange"]
let asset_class = msg.payload["asset_class"]
let asset_marginable = msg.payload["asset_marginable"]
let qty = msg.payload["qty"]
let avg_entry_price = msg.payload["avg_entry_price"]
let side = msg.payload["side"]
let market_value = msg.payload["market_value"]
let cost_basis = msg.payload["cost_basis"]
let unrealized_pl = msg.payload["unrealized_pl"]
let unrealized_plpc = msg.payload["unrealized_plpc"]
let unrealized_intraday_pl = msg.payload["unrealized_intraday_pl"]
let unrealized_intraday_plpc = msg.payload["unrealized_intraday_plpc"]
let current_price = msg.payload["current_price"]
let lastday_price = msg.payload["lastday_price"]
let change_today = msg.payload["change_today"]
let qty_available = msg.payload["qty_available"]

qty = parseFloat(qty)
current_price = parseFloat(current_price)
let market = (qty * current_price)

let profittoday = parseFloat(unrealized_intraday_pl)
profittoday = profittoday.toFixed(2)

let profit = parseFloat(unrealized_pl) 
profit = profit.toFixed(2)


let profittodaypct = (profittoday / market) * 100 

let profitpct = (profit / market) * 100 

//node.warn("Ticker: " +ticker+ " Profitpct: " +profitpct)

let target = 0.01


if (profitpct > target){ 
    
 //   node.warn("cover positions for ticker: " +ticker)
    msg.qty = qty
    msg.price = current_price
    msg.profit = unrealized_pl
    msg.profitpct = unrealized_plpc
    msg.symbol = ticker

    return msg;

}

name: create Alpaca order
get list of tickers to buy
get list of tickers to buy
func:
let id = msg.id
let symbol = msg.payload
symbol = symbol.replace(" ","")
msg.query = "select polygon_symbol, alpaca_symbol from alpaca_assets where symbol = '" +symbol+ "';"
//node.warn(msg.query)
msg.symbol = symbol
return msg;

name: Get price of trade trade
get symbols from alpaca_assets
func:
let polygon_symbol = msg.payload["polygon_symbol"]
let alpaca_symbol = msg.payload["alpaca_symbol"]
let symbol = msg.symbol

msg.alpaca_symbol = alpaca_symbol
msg.polygon_symbol = polygon_symbol
msg.symbol = symbol
//node.warn("Symbol: " +symbol+ " Polygon Symbol:" +polygon_symbol+ " Alpaca Symbol: " +alpaca_symbol) 
return msg;

subtag = flow.get("algo_name")

let result = symbol.includes("/");
if (result == true) {
    symbol = symbol.replace("/","")
}

let sql = "insert into order_confirms(id, client_order_id, created_at, updated_at, submitted_at, asset_id, symbol, asset_class, qty, order_type, type, side, time_in_force, status, subtag, source,extended_hours) values "
sql += "('" + id + "', '" + client_order_id + "', '" + created_at + "', '" + updated_at + "', '" + submitted_at + "', '" + asset_id + "', '" + symbol + "', '" + asset_class + "', '" + qty + "', '" + order_type + "', '" + type + "', '" + side + "', '" + time_in_force + "', '" + status + "', '" + subtag + "', '" + source + "', '" + extended_hours+ "'); " 

msg.query = sql
node.warn(msg.query)
msg.id = id
//msg.sql = "truncate table temp_ids"
//node.warn(msg.sql)
return msg;

name: get tickers from positions
truncate orders_open table
get last 100 open paper orders
insert into orders_open paper
func:
let id = msg.payload["id"]
let client_order_id = msg.payload["client_order_id"]
let created_at = msg.payload["created_at"]
let updated_at = msg.payload["updated_at"]
let submitted_at = msg.payload["submitted_at"]
let filled_at = msg.payload["filled_at"]
let expired_at = msg.payload["expired_at"]
let canceled_at = msg.payload["canceled_at"]
let failed_at = msg.payload["failed_at"]
let replaced_at = msg.payload["replaced_at"]
let replaced_by = msg.payload["replaced_by"]
let replaces = msg.payload["replaces"]
let asset_id = msg.payload["asset_id"]
let symbol = msg.payload["symbol"]
let asset_class = msg.payload["asset_class"]
let notional = msg.payload["notional"]
let qty = msg.payload["qty"]
if (qty === null) { qty = 0 }


let filled_qty = msg.payload["filled_qty"]
if (filled_qty === null) { filled_qty = 0 }

let filled_avg_price = msg.payload["filled_avg_price"]
if (filled_avg_price === null) { filled_avg_price = 0 }


let order_class = msg.payload["order_class"]
let order_type = msg.payload["order_type"]
let type = msg.payload["type"]
let side = msg.payload["side"]
let time_in_force = msg.payload["time_in_force"]

let limit_price = msg.payload["limit_price"]
if (limit_price === null) { limit_price = 0 }

let stop_price = msg.payload["stop_price"]
if (stop_price === null ){ stop_price = 0}

let status = msg.payload["status"]
let extended_hours = msg.payload["extended_hours"]
let legs = msg.payload["legs"]

let trail_percent = msg.payload["trail_percent"]
if (trail_percent === null) { trail_percent = 0 }

let trail_price = msg.payload["trail_price"]
if (trail_price === null) { trail_price = 0 }

let hwm = msg.payload["hwm"]
let subtag = msg.payload["subtag"]
let source = msg.payload["source"]

msg.query = "insert into orders_open (id,client_order_id,created_at,updated_at,submitted_at,filled_at,expired_at,canceled_at,failed_at,replaced_at,replaced_by,extended_hours,replaces,asset_id,symbol,asset_class,notional,qty,filled_qty,filled_avg_price,order_class,order_type,type,side,time_in_force,limit_price,stop_price,status,legs,trail_percent,trail_price,hwm,subtag,source, order_status, account) values ('" + id + "','" + client_order_id + "','" + created_at + "','" + updated_at + "','" + submitted_at + "','" + filled_at + "','" + expired_at + "','" + canceled_at + "','" + failed_at + "','" + replaced_at + "','" + replaced_by + "','" + extended_hours + "','" + replaces + "','" + asset_id + "','" + symbol + "','" + asset_class + "','" + notional + "','" + qty + "','" + filled_qty + "','" + filled_avg_price + "','" + order_class + "','" + order_type + "','" + type + "','" + side + "','" + time_in_force + "','" + limit_price + "','" + stop_price + "','" + status + "','" + legs + "','" + trail_percent + "','" + trail_price + "','" + hwm + "','" + subtag + "','" + source+ "', 'open', 'paper');"
//node.warn(msg.query)
return msg;

name: get tickers where profitpct > target
func:
let symbol = msg.symbol
let algo_name = flow.get("algo_name")


let asset_id = msg.payload["asset_id"]
let ticker = msg.payload["symbol"]
let exchange = msg.payload["exchange"]
let asset_class = msg.payload["asset_class"]
let asset_marginable = msg.payload["asset_marginable"]
let qty = msg.payload["qty"]
let avg_entry_price = msg.payload["avg_entry_price"]
let side = msg.payload["side"]
let market_value = msg.payload["market_value"]
let cost_basis = msg.payload["cost_basis"]
let unrealized_pl = msg.payload["unrealized_pl"]
let unrealized_plpc = msg.payload["unrealized_plpc"]
let unrealized_intraday_pl = msg.payload["unrealized_intraday_pl"]
let unrealized_intraday_plpc = msg.payload["unrealized_intraday_plpc"]
let current_price = msg.payload["current_price"]
let lastday_price = msg.payload["lastday_price"]
let change_today = msg.payload["change_today"]
let qty_available = msg.payload["qty_available"]

qty = parseFloat(qty)
current_price = parseFloat(current_price)
let market = (qty * current_price)

let profittoday = parseFloat(unrealized_intraday_pl)
profittoday = profittoday.toFixed(2)

let profit = parseFloat(unrealized_pl) 
profit = profit.toFixed(2)


let profittodaypct = (profittoday / market) * 100 

let profitpct = (profit / market) * 100 

//node.warn("Ticker: " +ticker+ " Profitpct: " +profitpct)

let target = 0.01


if (profitpct > target){ 
    
 //   node.warn("cover positions for ticker: " +ticker)
    msg.qty = qty
    msg.price = current_price
    msg.profit = unrealized_pl
    msg.profitpct = unrealized_plpc
    msg.symbol = ticker

    return msg;

}

name: update temp_orders

node.warn(symbol)
msg.query = "select * from positions where  symbol = '" +symbol+ "';"
node.warn(msg.query)
return msg;
